title: Larry Rivers, Steve Andersen and Peter Beard
description: 3 standing men man at L looks toward his PL, wearing a belted shirt and slacks; central man holds a footed dish in his PR hand, wearing a tank-top, cut-offs, thongs and glasses; man at R looking forward, holding a cigarette in his PR hand, wearing a polo shirt and a striped cloth tie around his waist
